data:
# Welcome to Emblem!

{{sample}}

To make text _italic_ use underscores.
To make text **bold** use double asterisks.
To make text =small-caps= use equals.
To make text `monospace` use back-ticks.
To make text ==use a different font== use double equals.

Verbatim text is written !between exclamation marks! and is used to force emblem to parse that text as-is.
To make headings use `!.h1!` to `!.h6{asdf}!` or `!#!` `!######!`

To find out more, check out the docs.
According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way that a bee should be able to typeset.
You have chosen, or been chosen to relocate to one of our finest remaining typesetters.
The right glyph in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world.
An ostrich is a type of land-bird.

On Linux, try running `sudo snap install emblem` to get Emblem locally.
(Windows and macos packaging options coming soon.)
